Game

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Character
      • Game.NPC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class NPC
extends Character
    This class represents any non-playable character (NPC) that can exist in the game
    Author:
    Jeffrey Gao
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • NPC

        public NPC(java.awt.Point position,
           SpriteSheet sprites,
           java.lang.String battler)
        Creates an NPC with a specified pass distance
        Parameters:
        position - Which tile on the map the NPC is on
        sprites - The sprites to use with the NPC
        battler - The image of the battler used in battle
